module.name: Announcements
module.changelog: *13.0.6.1* Ringfree branch *13.0.6* FREEPBX-12477 *13.0.5* FREEPBX-9773 1 second delay between annoucement *13.0.4* Slideout rnav *13.0.3* Adjust columns to be more meaningful. Show description and destination *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha4* FREEPBX-9495 Cannot Delete Announcement *13.0.1alpha3* Overall fixes and tweaks *13.0.1alpha2* Fix popovers *13.0.1alpha1* Complete reskin
module.description: Plays back one of the system recordings (optionally allowing the user to skip it) and then goes to another destination.
